titles.title: A bill to provide that the President may reduce foreign assistance to a country involved in illegal exports for nuclear explosive devices.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: 6/8/1988--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize the President to reduce U.S. economic and military assistance to a country determined to be involved in illegal exports for nuclear explosive devices. (Present law requires a total termination of assistance to such countries or a waiver of such total termination.)
